name: Balance (itch) (Giovanni Braconi)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Dodge all the flames that come from the bottom of the screen for 30 seconds in this pixel art game.

WHAT I DID

I developed this game from concept to completion in Unity , implementing the functionality writing C# scripts with visual studio. These are all the assets that i created:

● Pixel Environment(trunk and background forest)

● 2 Animated 2D Sprites (flames and water drop)

● 3 Music Themes (menu, level and game over)

● 3 Sound Effects (water splash, player death and UI buttons)

● 2 Particles Emitters(water splash, player death)

TOOLS

● Unity

● Visual Studio

● Adobe Photoshop

● FL Studio
